description: Extracted table for rule-related data from scoring system data filed to RDI.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: RULE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the CER rule used in the scoring system.

columns.name: RULE_SCORE
columns.description: The score from the rule in RULE_ID.

columns.name: RULE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The rule type category ID for the scoring system rule in RULE_ID.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Medications


Assessments


Risks


Admission/Transfer


Discharge


Orders


LDA Care


Wounds


ADLs

columns.name: SCORE_CALC_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the rule score is filed in UTC.
